manifest_app_description.message: Rajiko is a tool for unblocking geolocation restriction of radiko.jp! Enjoy the radio of Tokyo, Aomori, etc. from Osaka, Nagasaki, and even overseas!

firefox_optional_permissions_alert.message: Due to the limitation of Firefox, you need to manually enable site permissions for this feature.

firefox_tf30_incognito.message: Due to the limitation of Firefox, you need to login Radiko member in normal mode as well to download timefree30 program under private mode.
